import qualified Data.IntMap.Lazy as M
import Data.IntMap.Lazy ((!))
import Data.Char
import Data.List

type Atlas = M.IntMap Bool
type Coordinate = Int
size = 12

main = interact $ unlines . map (show . num_of_island) . read' . lines
 where
  read' [] = []
  read' xs = read_atlas (concat (take size xs)) : read' (drop (size+1) xs)

num_of_island :: Atlas -> Int
num_of_island a = num_to_fix paint_island a

paint_island :: Atlas -> Atlas
paint_island a
 | or (M.elems a) = foldr (\i a' -> M.adjust not i a') a (contiguous_from start a)
 | otherwise = a
    where start = head $ M.keys $ M.filter id a

num_to_fix :: Eq a => (a -> a) -> a -> Int
num_to_fix f x = if f x == x then 0 else 1 + num_to_fix f (f x)

read_atlas :: String -> Atlas
read_atlas = M.fromList . zip [0..] . map to_boolean
 where to_boolean d = case d of {'0'->False; '1'->True}

contiguous_from :: Coordinate -> Atlas -> [Coordinate]
contiguous_from i a = M.keys $ M.filterWithKey (\i' _ -> are_contiguous i i' a) a

are_contiguous :: Coordinate -> Coordinate -> Atlas -> Bool
are_contiguous c1 c2 a = if a!c1 /= a!c2 then False else investigate c1 []
 where
  investigate c trace
   | c == c2 = True
   | a!c /= a!c2 = False
   | otherwise = or $ map (flip investigate (c:trace)) (neighbors c \\ trace) 

neighbors :: Coordinate -> [Coordinate]
neighbors c = filter (not . is_outside) [pred c, succ c, c-size, c+size]
 where
  is_outside c' = is_westout c' || is_eastout c' || is_northout c' || is_southout c'
   where
    is_westout c' = div c size == succ (div c' size) && c == succ c'
    is_eastout c' = div c size == pred (div c' size) && c == pred c'
    is_northout c' = c' < 0
    is_southout c' = c' >= size*size

fill :: (IORef Int) -> (IOUArray (Int, Int) Char) -> (Int, Int) -> IO ()
fill ref arr p = do
    c <- readArray arr p
    when (c=='1') $ do
        modifyIORef ref (+1)
        fill' arr p

fill' :: (IOUArray (Int, Int) Char) -> (Int, Int) -> IO ()
fill' arr p@(x,y) = do
    c <- readArray arr p
    when (c=='1') $ do
        writeArray arr p '0'
        mapM_ (fill' arr) $ [(x+dx, y) | dx <- [1,-1]] ++ [(x,y+dy) | dy <- [1,-1]]

solve :: [[String]] -> [Int]
solve = map noi

noi :: [String] -> Int
noi ss = fst $ foldl count (0, iarr) idx
  where
    iarr = listArray ((0,0),(11,11)) $ concat ss
    idx = [(i,j)|i <- [0..11], j <- [0..11]]

count :: (Int, Array (Int,Int) Char) -> (Int,Int) -> (Int, Array (Int,Int) Char)
count (x, arr) (i,j)
  | arr ! (i,j) == '1' = (x+1, clear arr (i,j))
  | otherwise = (x, arr)

clear :: Array (Int,Int) Char -> (Int,Int) -> Array (Int,Int) Char
clear arr (i,j)
  | i < 0 || i > 11 || j < 0 || j > 11 = arr
  | arr ! (i,j) == '0' = arr
  | otherwise = foldl clear (arr // [((i,j),'0')]) [(i+1,j),(i,j+1),(i-1,j),(i,j-1)]
    
split :: [String] -> [[String]]
split ss
  | null bs = [as]
  | otherwise = as : split (tail bs)
  where
    (as, bs) = span (/= "") ss

getc :: ([String] -> a) -> IO a
getc f = f . lines <$> getContents

    return false

def remove_island(x, y)
  [[1, 0], [-1, 0], [0, 1], [0, -1]].each do |dx, dy|
    next if invalid_xy?(x + dx, y + dy)
    if @map[y + dy][x + dx] == 1
      @map[y + dy][x + dx] = 0
      remove_island(x + dx, y + dy)
    end
  end
end

def sinkIsland(x, y, islandmap)
  sunk = false
  if ((x < islandmap[0].size && y < islandmap.size) && islandmap[x][y] == 1) then
    islandmap[x][y] = 0
    sunk = true  
    #右チェック
    sinkIsland(x + 1, y, islandmap) if x + 1 < islandmap[0].size
    #左チェック
    sinkIsland(x - 1, y, islandmap) if 0 <= x - 1 
    #下チェック
    sinkIsland(x, y + 1, islandmap) if y + 1 < islandmap.size
    #上チェック
    sinkIsland(x, y - 1, islandmap) if 0 <= y - 1
  end
  return sunk
end

def dfs(xy, mat)
  mat.delete(xy)
  i, j = xy.split.map(&:to_i)
  direc = [[1,0],[0,1],[-1,0],[0,-1]]
  direc.each{|dx,dy|
    next if i+dx < 0 || j+dy < 0 || i+dx > 11 || j+dy > 11
    key = "#{i+dx} #{j+dy}"
    mat = dfs(key,mat) if mat[key]
  }
  return mat
end

class Board
  def initialize t
    @b = Array.new(144,0)
    (0..11).each do |x|
      (0..11).each do |y|
        if t[x][y] == "1" then
          @b[12*x+y] = 12*x+y+1
        end
      end
    end
  end

  def print
    (0..11).each do |x|
      (0..11).each do |y|
        if @b[12*x+y] != 0 then
          printf("%02x", @b[12*x+y])
        else
          printf( "  " )
        end
      end
      printf("\n")
    end
  end

  def neibor x, y
    n = []

    if @b[12*x+y] == 0 then
      return n
    else
      [ [x,y], [x-1,y], [x+1,y], [x,y-1], [x,y+1] ].each do |(xx,yy)|
        if 0 <= xx and xx < 12 and 0 <= yy and yy < 12 then
          v = @b[12*xx+yy]
          n.push v if v != 0
        end
      end
      n.uniq.sort
    end
  end

  def update tgt, val
    n = 0
    (12*12).times do |i|
      if tgt.include? @b[i] then
        @b[i] = val
        n += 1
      end
    end
    return n
  end

  def res
    @b.uniq.delete_if { |x| x == 0 }.size
  end
  
end

def solve t
  b = Board.new t
  while true
    c = 0
    12.times do |x|
      12.times do |y|
        n =  b.neibor(x,y)
        t =  n.shift
        c += b.update(n,t)
      end
    end
    break if c == 0
  end
#  b.print
  b.res
end

module Field
  def self.num_islands(grid)
    count = 0

    for i in 0...grid.size
      for j in 0...grid[i].size
        if grid[i][j] == 1
          count += 1
          dfs(grid, i, j)
        end
      end
    end

    count
  end

  def self.dfs(grid, i, j)
    return if grid[i][j] == 0
    grid[i][j] = 0

    search = [[1, 0], [0, 1], [-1, 0], [0, -1]]

    for k in 0...search.size
      l = i + search[k][0]
      m = j + search[k][1]
      dfs(grid, l, m) if 0 <= l && l < grid.size && 0 <= m && m < grid[l].size
    end
  end

  def self.graph(grid)
    grid.each do |row|
      puts row.join
    end
  end
end

  break if gets.nil?
end

def paint(bd)
  pl = bd.map{|bl| bl.map{0}}

  max_y = bd.length - 1
  max_x = bd[0].length - 1
  num = 0

  for y in (0..max_y)
    for x in (0..max_x)
      next if ! bd[y][x] || pl[y][x] > 0

      num += 1
      pl[y][x] = num
      queue = [[x, y]]

      while queue.length > 0
        x0, y0 = queue.shift

        if x0 > 0 && bd[y0][x0 - 1] && pl[y0][x0 - 1] == 0
          pl[y0][x0 - 1] = num
          queue.push [x0 - 1, y0]
        end
        if x0 < max_x && bd[y0][x0 + 1] && pl[y0][x0 + 1] == 0
          pl[y0][x0 + 1] = num
          queue.push [x0 + 1, y0]
        end
        if y0 > 0 && bd[y0 - 1][x0] && pl[y0 - 1][x0] == 0
          pl[y0 - 1][x0] = num
          queue.push [x0, y0 - 1]
        end
        if y0 < max_y && bd[y0 + 1][x0] && pl[y0 + 1][x0] == 0
          pl[y0 + 1][x0] = num
          queue.push [x0, y0 + 1]
        end
      end
    end
  end

  return num
end

module Graphical
	require 'set'

	def edge_length(u, v)
		1
	end

	def reachable_from(s, max_depth = nil)
		reached = Set[s]
		queue = [s]
		depth = 0
		loop {
			break if max_depth && depth >= max_depth
			next_queue = []
			until queue.empty?
				u = queue.shift
				each_to_node_of(u){|v|
					next if reached.include?(v)
					reached << v
					next_queue << v
				}
			end
			break if next_queue.empty?
			queue = next_queue
			depth += 1
		}
		return reached
	end

	def dijkstra(start, setting = {})
		raise "invalid setting" if setting.class != Hash
		raise "invalid setting" if setting.keys - [:goal, :multi_source, :multi_sink, :max_dist] != []
		
		start = Set[start] if !setting[:multi_source]
		goal = setting[:goal]
		goal = Set[goal] if goal && !setting[:multi_sink]
		max_dist = setting[:max_dist]

		h = Heap.new
		reached = Set.new
		start.each{|v|
			h.add(v, 0)
			reached << v
		}

		dist = {}
		until h.empty?
			u, key = h.del_min
			return key if setting[:goal] && goal.include?(u)
			break if max_dist && key > max_dist
			dist[u] = key
			each_to_node_of(u){|v|
				d = dist[u] + edge_length(u, v)
				if reached.include?(v)
					h.update_key(v, d)
				else
					h.add(v, d)
					reached << v
				end
			}
		end
		goal ? nil : dist
	end

	def bidir_dijkstra(s, t)
		f_dist = {}
		b_dist = {}

		f_heap = Heap.new
		b_heap = Heap.new

		f_heap.add(s, 0)
		b_heap.add(t, 0)

		f_reached = Set[s]
		b_reached = Set[t]

		f_current_dist = b_current_dist = 0
		best = Float::INFINITY

		loop {
			if !f_heap.empty?
				u, key = f_heap.del_min
				f_dist[u] = key
				f_current_dist = key
				each_to_node_of(u){|v|
					d = f_dist[u] + edge_length(u, v)
					if b_dist[v]
						path_len = d + b_dist[v]
						best = path_len if path_len < best
					end
					if f_reached.include?(v)
						f_heap.update_key(v, d)
					else
						f_heap.add(v, d)
						f_reached << v
					end
				}
			end

			if !b_heap.empty?
				u, key = b_heap.del_min
				b_dist[u] = key
				b_current_dist = key
				each_from_node_of(u){|v|
					d = b_dist[u] + edge_length(v, u)
					if f_dist[v]
						path_len = d + f_dist[v]
						best = path_len if path_len < best
					end
					if b_reached.include?(v)
						b_heap.update_key(v, d)
					else
						b_heap.add(v, d)
						b_reached << v
					end
				}
			end

			return best if f_current_dist + b_current_dist >= best
			return nil if f_heap.empty? && b_heap.empty?
		}
	end

	def prim(start)
		h = Heap.new
		h.add(start, 0)
		reached = Set[start]
		tree_len = 0

		until h.empty?
			u, key = h.del_min
			tree_len += key

			each_to_node_of(u){|v|
				d = edge_length(u, v)
				if reached.include?(v)
					h.update_key(v, d)
				else
					h.add(v, d)
					reached << v
				end
			}
		end
		tree_len
	end
end

loop {
	a = (1..12).map{gets.chomp.split("").map &:to_i}
	a.extend Graphical

	def a.each_to_node_of(u)
		y, x = u
		(-1..1).to_a.product((-1..1).to_a).each{|dx, dy|
			next if dx.abs + dy.abs != 1
			i, j = y+dy, x+dx
			next unless (0..self.size-1)===i 
			next unless (0..self[0].size-1)===j
			yield [i, j] if self[i][j] == self[y][x]
		}
	end

	count = 0
	(0..11).each{|i|
		(0..11).each{|j|
			if a[i][j] == 1
				count += 1
				a.reachable_from([i, j]).each{|y, x|
					a[y][x] = 0
				}
			end
		}
	}
	p count
	break unless gets
}

      if 0<=nx and nx<@mat.length and 0<=ny and ny<@mat.first.length

    end

class Board
  def initialize t
    @b = Array.new(144,0)
    (0..11).each do |x|
      (0..11).each do |y|
        if t[x][y] == "1" then
          @b[12*x+y] = 12*x+y+1
        end
      end
    end
  end

  def print
    (0..11).each do |x|
      (0..11).each do |y|
        printf("%02x ", @b[12*x+y])
      end
      printf("\n")
    end
  end

  def neibor x, y
    n = []

    if @b[12*x+y] == 0 then
      return n
    else
      [ [x,y], [x-1,y], [x+1,y], [x,y-1], [x,y+1] ].each do |(xx,yy)|
        if 0 <= xx and xx < 12 and 0 <= yy and yy < 12 then
          v = @b[12*xx+yy]
          n.push v if v != 0
        end
      end
      n.uniq.sort
    end
  end

  def update tgt, val
    n = 0
    (12*12).times do |i|
      if tgt.include? @b[i] then
        @b[i] = val
        n += 1
      end
    end
    return n
  end

  def res
    @b.uniq.sort
  end
  
end

def solve t
  b = Board.new t
  while true
    c = 0
    12.times do |x|
      12.times do |y|
        n =  b.neibor(x,y)
        t =  n.shift
        c += b.update(n,t)
      end
    end
    break if c == 0
  end
  b.res.size - 1
end

function dfs(&$field, $s) {
    $stack = array($s);
    $dx = array(1, -1, 0, 0);
    $dy = array(0, 0, 1, -1);
    while (count($stack)) {
        $node = array_pop($stack);
        $field[$node[0]][$node[1]] = '0';
        for ($i = 0; $i < 4; $i++) {
            $nx = $node[1] + $dx[$i];
            $ny = $node[0] + $dy[$i];
            if (!isset($field[$ny][$nx]) || $field[$ny][$nx] === '0') {
                continue;
            }
            $stack[] = array($ny, $nx);
        }
    }
}

function bfs($i, $j) {
	global $map, $dirs;
	$que = array(array($i, $j));
	while (!empty($que)) {
		$point = array_shift($que);
		$x = $point[0];
		$y = $point[1];
		// 探索済み
		$map[$x][$y] = 0;
		foreach ($dirs as $d) {
			$dx = $d[0];
			$dy = $d[1];
			if (isset($map[$x + $dy][$y + $dx]) && $map[$x + $dy][$y + $dx] == 1) {
				$map[$x + $dy][$y + $dx] = 0;
				$que[] = array($x + $dy, $y + $dx);
			}
		}
	}
}

$vectors = [[1, 0], [0, -1], [-1, 0], [0, 1]];

function solve() {
    $mp = [];
    for ($i = 0; $i < 12; $i++) {
        $mp[$i] = trim(fgets(STDIN));
        //echo $mp[$i] . "\n";
        //echo $mp[$i][10] . "\n";
    }
    $visited = array_fill(0, 12, array_fill(0, 12, false));
    $cnt = 0;
    for ($y = 0; $y < 12; $y++) {
        for ($x = 0; $x < 12; $x++) {
            if (!$visited[$y][$x] and $mp[$y][$x] === "1") {
                $cnt++;
                $visited[$y][$x] = true;
                search($x, $y, $mp, $visited);
            }
        }
    }
    return [$cnt, fgets(STDIN)];
}

function search($x, $y, &$mp, &$visited) {
    global $vectors;
    foreach ($vectors as $vector) {
        list($dx, $dy) = $vector;
        $nx = $x + $dx;
        $ny = $y + $dy;
        if ((0 <= $nx and $nx < 12 and 0 <= $ny and $ny < 12) and ($mp[$ny][$nx] === "1" and !$visited[$ny][$nx])) {
            $visited[$ny][$nx] = true;
            search($nx, $ny, $mp, $visited);
        }
    }
}

while (true) {
    list($cnt, $ok) = solve();
    echo $cnt . "\n";
    if (!$ok) {
        break;
    }
}

def solv(boad):
    boad = map(lambda x: [0] + x + [0], boad)
    boad.insert(0, [0] * 14)
    boad.append([0] * 14)
    n = sum([foo(boad, x, y) for x in xrange(1, 13) for y in xrange(1, 13)])
    return n


def foo(b, x, y):
    if b[y][x]:
        b[y][x] = 0
        foo(b, x-1, y)
        foo(b, x+1, y)
        foo(b, x, y-1)
        foo(b, x, y+1)
        return 1
    else:
        return 0
